section.section: The Department is the principal unit of State government responsible for developing, maintaining, revising, and enforcing statewide disability policies and standards throughout the units of State government.

text.section:
The Department shall oversee and administer the following programs and units:
constituent services and ombudsmen programs;
the Assistive Technology Guaranteed Loan Program under Subtitle 6 of this title; and
the Office of Personal Assistance Services, including the Attendant Care Program under Subtitle 4 of this title.
